sentence.Network_en: The statement of the last witness controvert the evidence of the first two.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后一个证人的陈述反驳了前两人的证词.

RelatedPhrase.word: This is a fact that cannot be controverted

list.key: This is a fact that cannot be controverted

list.abs: controvert指对……提出争论This is a fact that cannot be controverted. 这是一个不容置疑的事实。22. mast n. 桅杆，旗杆

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin controversus (see controversy), the pattern pairs such adversus (see adverse), advertere (see advert)

means.word_mean: 2. prove to be false or incorrect

auth_sentence.content: Of course it is possible not to know Kant, but it is impossible to controvert him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course it is possible not to know Kant, but it is impossible to controvert him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course it is possible not to know Kant, but it is impossible to controvert him.

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的

advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
